ValidationRule.description: The Deal's Primary Contact can't be missing any of the following fields: Address, Business Phone, or Email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Integrations", OR( ISBLANK(Contact__r.MailingStreet), ISBLANK(Contact__r.MailingCity), ISBLANK(Contact__r.MailingPostalCode), ISBLANK(Contact__r.Email), ISBLANK(Contact__r.Phone) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Submitted to Underwriting") , ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Loan Processing") , ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Underwriting") , ISPICKVAL( StageName , "UW Hold") , ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Approved by Committee") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Deal's Primary Contact is missing one or more of the following fields: Address, Business Phone, or Email. Please complete these fields before making this change.
